Service Details: - Promotes active outdoor recreation by maintaining trails used by hikers, runners, horse riders and mountain bikers in Myra-Bellevue and Okanagan Mountain Provincial Parks and other public lands on the South Slopes- Future projects and goals include:  repair all trails with erosion damage and add erosion control works to prevent further damage, brush trails where foliage is hindering trail use, and add new trails in Okanagan Mountain Park- Volunteer opportunities available
How to Apply: Membership application is available on the website
